import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-scroll"; import Footer from "./Footer"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import 'swiper/css'; import axios from "axios"; const PortfolioDetails = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const queryParameters = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search) console.log(queryParameters, '=====>queryParameters') const id= queryParameters.get("id"); let ids = 'a97eb1fa-4db9-433f-b4af-8bcc13b8ca03' const [portfolio, setPortfolio] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getPortfolio = async () => { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/user/project/${ids}`); let res = response.data.project; console.log(res) setPortfolio(res); }; getPortfolio(); }, []); return ( <> {/* */}
